title: [SOLVED]820-3115 long beep, short beep, long beep
message:
Hi,
i have a problem with a logic board 820-3115 3 longs beep, 3 short beep, 3 longs beep.
It's a problem with ROM EFI corrupted, is it possible to solve this problem? if yes how?
thanks

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 long beep, short beep, long beep
message: Load a clean/new BIOS to the chip.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 long beep, short beep, long beep
[SOLVED]820-3115 long beep, short beep, long beep
message:
sorry but why? the mbp work with U6100 take on another 820-3115.
can you explain me please?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 long beep, short beep, long beep
message: The BIOS ME region pairs itself with the PCH chip. If you put another BIOS on it will be paired to the PCH of the other board and not work properly. It will turn on, but you will get random shit like running slow, integrated graphics not working right, wifi sometimes not working. Just buy a programmer to do this properly.
